alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Blaine; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 02 at 11:23AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest, southwest, and western Oklahoma, including the following counties, in northwest Oklahoma, Blaine, Dewey and Ellis. In southwest Oklahoma, Caddo, Comanche, Greer, Harmon, Jackson, Kiowa and Tillman. In western Oklahoma, Beckham, Custer, Roger Mills and Washita. * WHEN...Through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Scattered thunderstorms will be possible this afternoon, which may cause areas of flooding. Additional and more widespread heavy rain is expected this evening and overnight. - For safety information, please visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Blaine; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills
